meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>midair</kanji> of <kanji>outer space</kanji> is the space that's in outer space which is <vocabulary>outer space</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>space</vocabulary>, and the <vocabulary>universe</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
